problem_text: A B C D is a parallelogram with side lengths as indicated in the figure at the right. The perimeter of A B C D is 22. Find A B.
compact_text: ABCD is a parallelogram with side lengths as indicated in the figure at the right. The perimeter of ABCD is 22. Find AB.
annotat_text: ABCD is a parallelogram with side lengths as indicated in the figure at the right. The perimeter of ABCD is 22. Find AB
